message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now before inflation eats away at the value.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering inflation is affecting you more, I believe this is a fair split.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting my potential gains each round. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
I understand inflation is affecting your gains, but I'm not willing to settle for less than what I think is fair. This is my new proposal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  The longer we wait, the less the money is worth to me.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  Don't be greedy!
